root.name: Gamebook Adventures 2: The Siege of the Necromancer
root.description: OverviewGamebook Adventures 2: The Siege of the Necromancer is a Gamebook game developed and published by Tin Man Games for the iPhone, iPad, and Android platforms.The story for The Siege of the Necromancer was written by Neil Rennison and the illustrations were done by Dan Maxwell.StoryAfter a summer away in the mines of Durath Tor, the player returns home to the coastal town of Myr. Once the player returns, it is found to be overrun by monsters. The player must now set out to rid the town of Erid Buul, the one who summoned the evil.
